summary.description: A (preferably one-line) summary of the issue.

description.description: A longer description of the issue.

lastUpdate.description: The date the issue was last updated in the parliament.

documentGroup.description: What document group this issue belongs to.

committee.description: What committee this issue belongs to. Should match the 'name' field in the committee type.

categories.description: List of categories (matching the 'name' field of the category type).
